org.flexiblepower.efi.buffer

Class BufferAllocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flexiblepower.ral.messages.ResourceMessage
      • org.flexiblepower.ral.messages.Allocation
        • org.flexiblepower.efi.buffer.BufferAllocation

  • public class BufferAllocation
extends Allocation
    This class is derived from Allocation and contains specific allocation information for a buffer appliance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferAllocation(ControlSpaceUpdate resourceUpdate, java.util.Date timestamp, boolean isEmergencyAllocation, java.util.Set<ActuatorAllocation> actuatorAllocations)
      A buffer allocation contains allocations for the actuators that it wishes to change.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferAllocation

        public BufferAllocation(ControlSpaceUpdate resourceUpdate,
                java.util.Date timestamp,
                boolean isEmergencyAllocation,
                java.util.Set<ActuatorAllocation> actuatorAllocations)
        A buffer allocation contains allocations for the actuators that it wishes to change. The unmentioned actuators of the buffer may do as they please.
